CONTACT_MY_DESCR: Choose to animate your party with a personalized musical interpretation and a lively scenic presence. The program is flexible and we can decide it either together, or at your choice from a predefined package. I guarantee total dedication and professionalism.
ABOUT_PARA_1: I’m a 26 year old singer, songwriter and content creator. I wanted a place where I could share my music and passions all together so I created this site. You can expect everything from original songs, covers, videos singing live as well as fashion, beauty, fitness and lifestyle posts.
ABOUT_PARA_2: I’m an experienced live singer. I wrote my first original song at the age of 14 and four years later I managed to release it as my first single. In my desire to release more music content I‘ve created my own home studio where I’m recording and mixing all by myself. I perform at events, clubs and weddings. With a diversified and always actualized playlist I can entertain the public with lots of good music in an original way, with passion and professionalism.
ABOUT_PARA_3: Getting myself prepared for concerts made me realize that I enjoy doing my make-up and styling my wardrobe. The latter should come as no surprise because who doesn’t love buying clothes. I will constantly update new looks with refreshing trends and I intend to share my adventures with you.
ABOUT_PARA_4: Dear reader, I hope to inspire you. I wish you a nice journey and don’t hesitate to share your opinion.
BLOG_POST_1_2: As this is my first blog post, I felt it was appropriate to write about music, events and the following projects. Of course, I will post about fashion and make-up as well, but let's take it step by step.
BLOG_POST_1_3: In the past 3 years I have gained experience singing at various events: weddings, baptism parties, private parties, club inaugurations, indoor and outdoor concerts with both the band and on my own, as a solo singer. I like to sustain the atmosphere of an event, that's why I occasionally activate as a presenter / MC. I can say that at first, the attention on the stage was a little overwhelming, but there is no greater satisfaction than when I deliver art and excitement to those around me and feel them resonate with me.
BLOG_POST_1_4: I find myself lucky because I have the opportunity to combine work and fun. Long repetitive hours, along with a good cup of coffee and the mind set on the next event is my favorite routine.
BLOG_POST_1_5: Now I'm working on an original song that I'm going to release later this year, along with a video. More details to follow ...
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_1: Daca vrei sa iti cresti pagina de business sau pagina personala cu audienta organia, reala si predominant din Romania, te invit sa participi la cele mai de succes mega giveaway-uri de pe piata pe pagina mea
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_2: Toate serviciile sunt realizate de catre o Persoana Fizica Autorizata, pe factura si contract la cerere.
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_3: Cresterea este garantata. Vor fi comunicate, inainte de trimiterea facturii urmatoarele informatii, prin intermediul mesageriei Instagram:
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_LI_4: Extra reduceri pt grupuri (cel putin 2 persoane)
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_4: Giveaway-urile sunt cu multipli sponsori, in general intre 20 si 25 la numar. Followerii de pe @lauraserbanofficial sunt motivati sa dea follow tuturor sponsorilor prin organizarea unui concurs cu premiu Iphone 12. Regulile de participare pentru followeri sunt simple: follow la sponsori si comment (sau dupa caz, like) la poza de concurs. Concursul se desfasoara pe durata a mai multor zile, extragerea se face cu un tool cu algoritm aleator, pe story, la final.
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_5: Pentru a usura procesul de urmarire a sponsorilor pentru followeri, lista completa a sponsorilor se va regasi in interiorul aplicatiei Instagram, la sectiunea Following a unuia din conturile:
GIVEAWAY_IPHONE_PARA_6: Pentru a garanta cresterea, concursul poate fi repostat in feed, cu referinta la postarea originala si / sau in story, dar optional si in feed-ul sau pe story la alte conturi cu reach si audienta buna.
